name: Amatria Tansiq
effect:
Elf • Assassin / Tansiq
React: Before target opposing character kills Amatria with a strike or action: The target must succeed with a poison check (DC 12) or suffer a wound.
"Be thankful the shadows mask her face." - The Lady of Pain

name: Ancient Scimitar
effect:
Weapon
React: Once per turn, before target opposing character is killed by this fighter: Succeed with a Skill check (DC 21 - the target's Level) to remove a wound from this fighter. Remove the target from the game after it dies.

name: Axe of Tergoth
effect:
Weapon
This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.
"Too big for you!" - Kul of Clan Tergoth

name: Babbling Mouther
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.

"You chatter, gibber, and babble, but those voices serve as a counterpoint to my own. They're most calming, and let those who cannot stand the cacophony serve as your repast! They come willingly to your lair when I speak of the treasure, the witless fools!" - Jigoral

name: Backstab
effect: React: Before this rogue makes a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike is spent, this rogue gains +5 ATK for this strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Too easy. No art to it." - The Lady of Pain

name: Bear's Soul
effect: Order: Perform a melee strike. You may shuffle Bear's Soul into your deck.
"Found in the heart of the greatest warriors." - Shah'syss

name: Belt of Bear
effect:
POWERATTACK +5
If this fighter is a Barbarian, he may perform the POWERATTACK feat an additional time per turn.
"You need to let Bear become part of you for it to work properly." - Hrunting

name: Bloodthirsty
effect: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character: This fighter performs a melee strike with an ATK equal to the previous strike.
"The only way to bathe." - Hrunting

name: Bola
effect: Order: Spend Bola: Perform a +4 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.
"Useful for bringing down those not worth an arrow, so that the Bone Fiends may feast." - Kaimir

name: Bone Fiend
effect:
Elf • Undead
At the end of each turn, kill an Elf you control or remove an Elf in your discard pile from the game.
Order: Kill another Undead: Bone Fiend gains +3 ATK until end of turn.

name: Breastplate
effect:
Armor
Cleric and fighter only.
"In this climate it seems to be the only sensible armor." - Sir Robert

name: Brine Fiend
effect: Mercenary • Monster
"May I feed one? May I?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Bull Rush
effect: Spend Order: Move this fighter forward one rank. If this fighter is now in your front rank and he is not stunned, he may perform an attack without spending. Barbarians gain +3 ATK for the duration of the attack.
"You were a fool to come here, elf." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Burrowing Basilisk
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
React: Once per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by Basilisk: The target suffers one wound the next time he spends or stuns this turn.
"Poisonous creatures from the deep desert, their bite can be deadly long after you have slain one." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Camel
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Camel: Move this character either forward one rank or to another position in this rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend Camel: Ready a non-stunned item of Level 5 or less equipped to this character.

name: Cloudracer
effect:
Steed
Order: Discard a card from your hand: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Cloudracer: Move forward or backward one rank.
"She's been with me since the start. The nearest thing I have to family now." - Logan

name: Collapsing Bow
effect:
Bow
Order: Spend the Collapsing Bow: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Order: Once per turn: If this rogue is a Scout, perform a +2 ranged strike.
"They fold down small enough that a typical gateguard won't notice it." - Yemat

name: Cry Havoc
effect: Spend Order: Target all opposing characters within one rank: Perform a melee strike against each target.
"Time to do my father proud. Kill them all." - King Alaric

name: Double Shot
effect: Order: Stun a ready Bow equipped to this rogue: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.
"Bah, these goblin bows have a lousy pull, Scyrax!" - Yemat

name: Flurry of Knives
effect: Spend Order: Perform three +2 ranged strikes.
"Sometimes it's just as important to give them an incentive to keep their heads down." - Logan

name: Freia
effect:
Elf
React: Before fixing an illegal second rank: If your Warlord is an Elf, put Freia into your first rank from your hand.
"You wouldn't believe what I found in the ocean."

name: Gloves of Mischief
effect:
Gauntlet
React: After this rogue is targeted with a strike or action, spend Gloves of Mischief: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent character, if possible.
"The Lady of Pain's idea of mischief is far removed from most other people's." - Artheon

name: Griffon of Misear
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Griffon of Misear: Move forward one rank.
React: Before this fighter falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Griffon of Misear: This fighter does not spend or stun before moving.
Used extensively in the years of war, they have become almost rare now.

name: Handaxe
effect:
Weapon
Wounds inflicted by melee strikes from this character may not be reduced.
"Weapons of the forehatched!" - Shah'syss

name: I Have Your Back
effect: React: After another character in this rank is targeted with a strike: The strike is redirected to this fighter, if possible.
"We'll not lose you again, Robert." - Corten Lye

name: Jigoral
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"They whisper, they instruct, they make me do terrible things! Drown the voices in screams my lady, please please please..."

name: Kaimir
effect:
Elf • SCRIBE +3 / Glyn
Kaimir is a rogue and a wizard.
Kaimir enters play as if she were Level 4.
Spend Order: Perform two +5 ranged strikes. This action is a spell.
"Fire and Ice." - Artheon

name: Keridwen
effect:
Mercenary / Tribe of Stags
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
"I just pick the scraps the brine fiends leave behind. That's not much, but it's an easy life."

name: Kinnell
effect:
Elf
Kinnell inflicts an additional wound with ranged strikes against lower Level characters.
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"It was my brother, if you must know."

name: Landshark
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
React: After Landshark performs an attack that hit with the first two strikes: Perform a +7 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.
"A mindless creature that never lets go. And the stench, once it swallows you... ugh." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Leap of the Clouds
effect:
Order: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: This rogue gains +4 AC for the duration of the strike.
"Have I mentioned how much I hate this?" - Sipho Hamisi

name: Leveled
effect: React: After this character performs a strike or action that killed an opposing character of equal or higher Level: This character permanently gains +1 Level, +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 HP, and +2 Skill. Remove this card from the game.

name: Long Bow
effect:
Bow
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"Yes, the bone is probably from humans, fused by unholy elven magic. But now I use it against them." - Graham Heyward

name: Maxt Stormcrow
effect:
Elf • Ranger
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"I don't care how many slaves they bring, I've got an arrow for each of them."

name: Minor Dragonkin
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Monster
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, target an item within one rank: Succeed with a magic check (DC 8 + the item's Level) to destroy the item.

name: Mistress Allandra
effect:
Elf
React: Once per turn, after Allandra performs a ranged strike that killed the target: Ready Allandra.
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
"Grisly? It's just bone, human."

name: Mourn Imp
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

name: Outmatched
effect: React: After target opposing character enters play in the front rank or moves into the front rank: If this character is in the front rank, perform a melee strike against the target.
"E'en with our empire lost, thou still canst not compare." - Squire Fastus

name: Raak
effect:
Elf • Scout / Vaneris
Order: Once per turn, target a charcter within two ranks: Until end of turn, your Elves gain +2 to ranged strikes against the target.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.

name: Rotale Dythanus
effect:
Elf • Undead
Order: Once per turn, kill a higher Level Elf: Perform a +5 melee strike.
"An elf's life may be short, but his undeath is eternal."

name: Rowan's Duty
effect: React: After this character performs a strike or action that killed an opposing character of equal or higher Level that was more than one rank away: This character permanently gains +1 Level, +1 HP, +5 Skill, and a +4 bonus to ranged strikes. Remove this card from the game.
"Our true duty has been long forgotten." - Sedayah

name: Scale Mail
effect:
Armor
This fighter gains +2 AC while targeted with a ranged strike.
"It has saved my life many times from a coward's arrow." - Kerebrus

name: Scimitar
effect:
Weapon
React: After this fighter performs an attack: An adjacent character performs an attack, spending as normal.
"The traditional Thessyrian design. Even the gods could not change it." - Redu Tam

name: Sedwin Elfhunter
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to Sedwin's Skill.
React: After Sedwin kills a character: Sedwin permanently gains +1 Skill. If the character was an Elf, he also permanently gains +1 Level. Sedwin cannot exceed Level 5 using this react.

name: Shade Lion
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Shade Lion: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: Before this rogue falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Shade Lion: This rogue does not spend or stun before moving.
"We will teach these masked cowards to fear the night." - Scyrax

name: Shadith Glyn
effect:
Elf • Scout • MARKSMANSHIP +5
Order: Once per turn, spend a character in this rank: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"The elven nation has no more tolerance to give. Our arrows shall serve as ambassadors."

name: Shah'syss
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Barbarian • Monster / Sutek
Your other Monsters gain +2 ATK.
React: After Shah'syss kills an opposing character: Move a Monster you control forward one rank.
"The gates are open finally and the Sssutek Empire shall rise once again."

name: Sharkbone Bow
effect:
Bow
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Once per turn: Perform a +2 ranged strike that may target an additional rank away.

name: Sta'ash
effect:
Mercenary • Barbarian • Monster / Sutek
React: Before target character is killed by Sta'ash: If the target is higher Level, remove a wound from Sta'ash. If the target is lower Level, remove it from the game after it dies.

name: Steady Aim
effect: Order: Target an item within two ranks: This rogue must succeed with a dexterity check (DC 8 + the item's Level) to destroy the item. If the check fails, the character with the item equipped may perform a melee strike targeting this rogue.

name: Stirges
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
React: Once per turn, after Stirges perform a melee strike that hit: Stirges perform a melee strike.
"These are just birds, right? RIGHT?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Stubborn
effect:
Order: Move forward one rank.
React: After this fighter is targeted with an action that could spend, stun, or move him, inflict 1 wound on this fighter: Cancel the action. Until the end of the turn this fighter cannot be spent, stunned, or moved by opposing card effects.

name: Su-tatra
effect:
Mercenary • Monster / Sutek
May not equip Armor or Shields.
Su-tatra suffers -4 AC while spent.
Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike that inflicts no wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.
"Home!"

name: Thunic Hydra
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Unique
May not equip items.
Thunic Hydra has one fewer melee strike (losing its primary ATK first) when it attacks for each wound it has.
"What do you mean, they grow heads?" - Stanley

name: Thunic Wyvern
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Wyvern may perform rogue action cards.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
"Far cousins. And not too intelligent either." - Su-tatra

name: Too Fast to See
effect: React: After a strike roll targeting this rogue: The strike is a Critical Failure.
"Once I've taken your eyes, you won't see me leave, either." - The Lady of Pain

name: Twisted Hyenas
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target character within one rank must succeed with a fear save (DC 13) or become spent.
"They are not content merely to feast upon carrion." - Azam

name: Validan
effect:
Mercenary / Master of Combat
While Validan has a Shield equipped, he ignores any of its restrictions on making multiple strikes during an attack or turn.
"Step into the ring and I'll break you."

name: Wythien
effect:
Elf • Ranger • STEALTH +8
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"The screams of my enemies make me forget the pain in my bones."

name: Yvaalis
effect:
Elf Warlord • MARKSMANSHIP +2
Yvaalis gains +1 to ranged strikes and MARKSMANSHIP checks for each Charge on her.
React: Once per turn, after Yvaalis kills an opposing character with a ranged strike: Put a Charge on her.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
